title: Live updates: Downtrend in new U.S. infections stalls, fueling concerns over virus variants’ spread
content:
1. Live updates: Downtrend in new U.S. infections stalls, fueling concerns over virus variants’ spread  The Washington Post
  2. More Wisconsinites become eligible for coronavirus vaccines this week  WKOW
  3. The Latest: First US J&J vaccine doses shipping Sunday night  Associated Press
  4. A fifth of healthcare workers in England have still not received first Covid jab  The Guardian
  5. Spain to give just one vaccine dose to under 55-year olds who had COVID-19  Yahoo News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 实时更新。美国新感染病例的下降趋势停滞不前，加剧了对病毒变种传播的担忧。
實時更新。美國新感染病例的下降趨勢停滯不前，加劇了對病毒變種傳播的擔憂。
